tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_activity_currency_numbers; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_activity_currency_numbers AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id, CASE WHEN afa.date IS NOT NULL AND proj_currency.amp_currency_id IS NOT NULL THEN afa.date ELSE NULL END AS ppc_transaction_date, CASE WHEN afa.date IS NOT NULL AND proj_currency.amp_currency_id IS NOT NULL THEN to_char(afa.date, 'J')::integer ELSE NULL END AS ppc_date_code, CASE WHEN afa.date IS NOT NULL AND proj_currency.amp_currency_id IS NOT NULL THEN proj_currency.amp_currency_id ELSE NULL END AS ppc_currency_id, CASE WHEN afa.date IS NOT NULL AND proj_currency.amp_currency_id IS NOT NULL THEN afa.amount ELSE NULL END AS ppc_transaction_amount FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN amp_funding_amount afa ON afa.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id LEFT JOIN amp_currency proj_currency ON proj_currency.currency_code = afa.curr_code WHERE afa.type = 0 ORDER BY amp_activity_id;
